element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT CONCAT_WS(' ','Выручка кассы №', pos.kkm_number) kkm, :pkasir kasir, CONCAT_WS(' ',CAST(pos.number AS CHAR),DATE_FORMAT(mo.date,'%H-%i')) term, mo.date AS shiftdate, login.user_name AS cashiername, mo.date operday, mo.amount AS sum, CONCAT(' ',xrep.num_to_text(mo.amount)) spellsum, tis.accountant, tis.accountant_position FROM ukmserver.trm_in_store tis INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos pos ON tis.store_id=pos.store_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_moneyoperation mo ON pos.cash_id = mo.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_login login ON login.cash_id = mo.cash_id AND login.id = mo.login WHERE mo.date>= STR_TO_DATE( :pdate , '%Y-%m-%d') AND mo.date<DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( :pdate , '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND tis.store_id= :pstore ORDER BY pos.number,mo.date
